DOC.brief_summary: This is a multiple ascending dose study; the purpose of this study is to examine the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics (levels of drug in the blood) of SPD489 in Schizophrenic Patients who are currently maintained on a stable dose of an antipsychotic medication.
DOC.brief_title: Assess the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Ascending, Multiple Oral Doses of SPD489 in Adults With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Subjects must be diagnosed with schizophrenia, on a stable dose of an antipsychotic and not have any cardiac risk factors
